latex: Jack has $3$ unfair coins and each land on tails with a probability of $60\%$. If it lands on heads, he rolls a fair die but if it lands on tails, he moves on to the next coin. He scores his game in the sense that each die roll is worth the number that is showing up. The coin flip is worth $1$ point for each head and $2$ points for each tail. What is the expected value of the number of points he gets?
